The ruling may result in reduced transfer fees and increased economic power for players, impacting clubs' financial stability.

Pakistan plans several tours in the coming months.

Mayank Yadav claims maiden international wicket - WATCH

title: Watch: Sreesanth brings back memories of rodeo style six in LLC
description: S Sreesanth relived his iconic 2006 moment against Andre Nel during the Legends League Cricket match in 2024. Known for his memorable six and dance then, Sreesanth hit another magnificent six against Dan Christian, impressing teammates Shikhar Dhawan and Mohammad Kaif, but without the past's taunting bravado.

title: 'I was a bit nervous': Mayank Yadav
description: Young cricketers Mayank Yadav and Nitish Kumar Reddy, who debuted for India in the first T20 International against Bangladesh, overcame nerves with support from captain Suryakumar Yadav. Mayank impressed with his bowling, while Nitish played a crucial innings, contributing to India's seven-wicket victory. The second T20 of the series will take place in New Delhi on Wednesday.

title: There will be no margin of error against Australia: Smriti Mandhana
description: The Indian Women's T20 team must not only defeat Sri Lanka but do so decisively to boost their net run-rate ahead of their critical match against Australia. Vice-captain Smriti Mandhana emphasizes the importance of minimizing errors, especially against the reigning champions.
